RemoteHomeConnectionException - Exception in org.remoteHome
This class represents the communication errors with the harware.It is thrown by the RemoteHomeCommunicator class, it means by the communication layer of the API.

RemoteHomeManager - Class in org.remoteHome
This is the main starting point of the remote-home API.

RemoteHomeManagerException - Exception in org.remoteHome
This class represents the exception, thrown by the RemoteHomeManager class, it means by the business logic of the API.
